DOC.brief_summary: In this study, the effects of a 14-day inpatient treatment in an internal medicine ward for integrative medicine on pain, disability, quality of life, satisfaction with life, depression, and anxiety will be investigated. Furthermore the influence of potential process variables will be evaluated. Effects will be measured after completion of the program (2 weeks), and at 6 months follow up after start of the program.
DOC.criteria: diagnosed with any chronic pain condition at least 6 months pain duration written informed consent participation in any other clinical study
